DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo laparoscopic hysterectomy promontofixation randomize four group : Group 1 : 12mmHg intraperitoneal pressure cool , dry CO2 gas ( n=20 ) , Group 2 : 12mmHg intraperitoneal pressure warm , humidify CO2 gas ( n=20 ) , Group 3 : 8mmHg intraperitoneal pressure cool , dry CO2 gas ( n=20 ) , Group 4 : 8mmHg intraperitoneal pressure warm , humidify CO2 gas ( n=20 ) . Normal peritoneum collect parietal wall begin laparoscopic surgery 1 2 hour . Expression gene encode component fibrinolytic system , extracellular matrix adhesion molecule , inflammatory cytokine signal molecule peritoneal tissue measure real-time PCR . Quality post-operative recovery QoR-40 , post-operative pain Visual Analog Scale , per post operative complication intraoperative core temperature assess compare .
DOC.criteria: Age 4575 year old Petients undergo laparoscopic hysterectomy promontofixation uterine prolapse Menopaused ASA class I II Absolute contraindication laparoscopy Previous history pelvic surgery , endometriosis and/or infection Pathological peritoneal tissue BMI 30 Height less 150cm
